name: LEAP
description: The online marketing agency LEAP / has emerged from the merger of the renowned agencies Barketing and ConversionLift and stands as market leader for goal-oriented analyzes, wise strategies as well as for perfection in the implementation. The merger of a top search engine optimization company and one of the most successful converters in Conversion Optimization enables the unique fusion of know-how and expertise into a strong full-service brand: LEAP.
